architectural_notes: GPIO button events trigger HTTP POST to localhost:3000/gpio instead of shell commands

existing_features.title: Replace the gpioset command execution in ControlRenderer with HTTP POST requests to http://localhost:3000/gpio. The request payload must include the button decimal code and a value of "on" when the button is pressed and "off" when the button is released.
Update the gpioHttp.ts utility module to support sending both the decimal code and the on/off state value in the POST request payload to http://localhost:3000/gpio.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace GPIO command with HTTP POST to localhost:3000/gpio with button code and on/off value

projectName: Replace GPIO command execution with HTTP POST requests
